attributes.action: allow companies other than the Royal Mail to deliver personal as well as business mail, and also open their own post offices- and not shut the rural ones down. As consumers, we'd have a choice of who delivers our post!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It does seem that Royal Mail has itself a little monopoly over the private mail, and it would be fair if it had a rival who could not only provide cheaper private mail services, but also deliver when they say they'll deliver. It'd be very nice to have the choice of who we send our ebay items/christmas cards/letters etc with.

Also, these rival companies could also open their own post offices wherever they like, without restriction.

Come on Virgin, MacDonalds, Coca Cola- there's a market for you out there!
